channel.title: How to make internet/Firefox come up on start of client
channel.description: This guide may be old. Well, we don't need to edit alot of files like the other tut. Just follow this step, and ur done in 30 seconds. 1:Go to ur client folder and right-click run.bat then click edit. 2:U will see some words, and u will see like "TITLE Yourclientname" under that add: [code]start iexplore Sitehere[/code] Example:start iexplore moparisthebest.com/smf No www. needed! For Firefox do this: [code]start firefox Sitehere[/code] Example:start firefox moparisthebest.com/smf No www. needed! Good luck on adding!

item.title: How to make internet/Firefox come up on start of client
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

This guide may be old. Well, we don’t need to edit alot of files like the other tut. Just follow this step, and ur done in 30 seconds.
1:Go to ur client folder and right-click run.bat then click edit.
2:U will see some words, and u will see like “TITLE Yourclientname” under that add:

start iexplore Sitehere Example:start iexplore moparisthebest.com/smf No www. needed!
For Firefox do this:

start firefox Sitehere Example:start firefox moparisthebest.com/smf No www. needed!
Good luck on adding!

Read full topic
item.source: How to make internet/Firefox come up on start of client
